original_text: Shaphan brought the book to the king, and further reported to the king, “All that was committed to your servants they are doing.
korean_text: 사반이 책을 가지고 왕에게 나아가서 복명하여 이르되 왕께서 종들에게 명령하신 것을 종들이 다 준행하였나이다

sentences.original_text: Shaphan brought the book to the king
and further reported to the king
All that was committed to your servants
